channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Household /Bulky waste dumped, 8th December
item.description:
Bulky / household waste fly tipped in this location

item.title: Illegal occupation of resident parking bay, 8th December
item.description:
Since 3 weeks now the section of the bay in front of 54 Jenner Road, N16 has been blocked from use to other residents through the use of ribbish waste bins.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Jenner Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Plumstead Common at the rear of properties, 8th December
item.description:
Fly tipping of garden and household/builders rubbish located at the rear of the properties on Heavitree Road. This has been here 2 weeks and will encourage others to tip here. This area of Plumstead Common is a conservation zone.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heavitree Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man hole cover loose/damaged. On the road going towards the a20, 8th December
item.description:
The man hole cover is loose or damaged. Every time a car drives over it, it makes a loud noise which I can hear all the way into the bedroom at the back of the flats. It happened a few months ago and then stopped/was repaired. But as of yesterday it started again. It is a busy road and I am hearing this noise every time a car drives over it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently covered pothole even worse than before, 8th December
item.description:
A recently covered pothole around a drain/manhole cover is even worse than it was before. The repetitive noise of the drain/manhole cover being hit by wheels is becoming unbearable and the pothole itself is a danger to cyclists etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: O/S No 40, 8th December
item.description:
Caller called to report a problem on the tree in front of house. stated it concern safety issue and reports that the trunk is very wide and takes up a large part of the pavement and prevents access and egress for the general public and for wheel chairs and buggies. Caller is requesting to that a Tree Officer visits and investigates the tree. Please contact the caller who wishes to discuss with a Tree Officer
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenhurst Avenue, Gospel Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th December
item.description:

item.title: Significant pothole at junction of Woolwich Road and Essenden Road, 8th December
item.description:
This pothole has been here for several months and constitutes a hazard to cyclists and motorcyclists. I estimate its size to be 12 inches x 8 inches x 1.5 inches deep. Location is opposite the library
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Essenden Road, Lessness Heath, Greater London
